title: Roasted pork fillet with fennel and carrots
ingredients: ['1 (450g) pork fillet, trimmed of fat', '3 tablespoons honey mustard', '2 tablespoons dried thyme', '5 carrots, chopped', '3 large fennel bulbs, chopped', '1 onion, sliced', '1 tablespoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper']
